attributes.action: Increase business mileage allowance from 45p per mile to 85p per mile
attributes.additional_details: This has been the same for over many many years and needs to increase. Those who run a business or claim mileage, doesn't cover the cost for the wear and tear on our vehicles never mind the horrendous fuel increase
attributes.background: Business mileage rates are in two bands. The first 10,000 miles for cars is 45p per mile, after 10,000 miles is goes down to 25p per mile.  I want this increased to at least 85p per mile

rejection.details:
We currently have the below petition open on the same topic, which you might like to sign:

Increase the tax-free approved Mileage Allowance Payment rate and review yearly
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/601286
